[賢]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɡiːn ): phonetic 臤 ( OC *kʰaːn, *kʰriːn, *ɡiːn, *kʰins ) + semantic 貝 ( “ money ” ) – worthy, valuable (like money)

[覧] variant form of 覽.

[覽]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɡ·raːmʔ ): phonetic 監 ( OC *kraːm, *kraːms ) + semantic 見 ( “ see ” ) .
